Kaixin often thinks of Tietong and is surprised to find someone who looks exactly like his late senior. Kongli asks Baida, who is a hopeless gambler, to impersonate Tietong so as to keep Kaixin under his control. Kaixin falls for the sham and believes that Tietong has reincarnated.

programme.desc: Having passed the first test, in order to attain the Dino Trainer badge and rank, Ritchie, Carol, Howell and Hardy went to the Bermuda Gym to accept the test of the Emperor Tyrannosaurus. Having gained enough experience, the four thought they could easily defeat Emperor Tyrannosaurus, but to their surprise, Emperor Tyrannosaurus was able to control dinosaurs' minds. And they didn't expect that this test was a tacit understanding between Dino Trainers and their little dinosaurs. Four dinosaurs lost themselves in the test, completely disobeying orders, leaving the four people stunned. In the end, the four of them calmly helped their dinosaurs regain their composure and made their way to the finish line. However, before they succeeded, on the other hand, the hunting team was following them and learned Emperor Tyrannosaurus's special ability and immediately reported to their boss behind the scenes, Professor Yan. Professor Yan and the hunting team wanted to control Emperor Tyrannosaurus...

Help soon arrives in the form of a confinement nanny. Real-life parents talk about their birth experiences, while a doula and gynaecologist share about what couples can expect in their pregnancy journey.

programme.title: Ming Lee c/o Manickam
programme.desc: A Chinese boy fostered in an Indian family? Yes! Ming Lee, a foster child, becomes an unexpected but necessary part of the Manickam family. Having been neglected from a young age, Ming Lee was brought up by his troubled parents, till the home had found the perfect foster family for him - the Manickams. An amusing story of how a young boy is trying to fit in a peculiar family with different people with the added challenge of cultural and language differences.
